name: My Driving Academy
description:
My Driving Academy is a PC-based game with a puzzle genre combined with educational elements, namely learning about traffic ethics. Players can compile movement cards to plan for their route while taking into account existing limitations such as the gas tank, health points, and other obstacles.

Created by Sinpsher

  1. Btari Aliya Tsabitah (Artist)
  2. Erlinda Argyanti Nugraha (Programmer)
  3. Anggun Wahyuni (Programmer)
